titles.title: A resolution returning to the Senate the bill S. 1748.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 6/16/1988--Introduced. Returns to the Senate S. 1748, a bill which prohibits the import of products from Iran, because in the opinion of of the House of Representatives it contravenes the U.S. Constitution and is an infringement of the privileges of the House.
